tweet: Today, the hourglass runs out on critical legislation that would have kept $255 million in place for #HBCUs and Minority Serving Institutions. Now is not the time to turn our backs on our students. I encourage my colleagues in the Senate to reconsider passing the #FutureAct.
To all who celebrate Rosh Hashanah, I’m wishing you a joyous and prosperous new year! pic.twitter.com/j0YRTXh9Ni

On the 43rd anniversary of the Hyde Amendment, the administration’s agenda of exclusion, shame and punishment towards women who seek abortions is appalling. A woman’s choice should be protected and I am proud to support the EACH Woman Act. #BeBoldEndHyde

We should all be able to live, work and make decisions about our health and future with dignity and economic security. The EACH Woman Act ensures that coverage bans like the Hyde Amendment won’t stand in the way of anyone’s decision for themselves and their family. #BeBoldEndHyde

Thank you, #OneMeck, for another successful Military Service Academy Day! The decision our young people make to pursue higher education at a Service Academy is not one that is made lightly and I commend them for their commitment to serving our country. pic.twitter.com/LidQ7P7mjH

On national #NorthCarolinaDay, I am proud to represent this great state’s 12th Congressional District in the United States House of Representatives. It truly is the best feeling to have “Carolina in My Mind”. pic.twitter.com/KcRmTgRjHQ

The citizens of North Carolina shouldn’t be subjected to political #gerrymandering. My colleagues @RepDavidEPrice, @GKButterfield and I issued a joint statement in full support of the lawsuit filed today to challenge NC’s congressional map. Predatory #debt collection practices are a nationwide problem. Americans should not be intimidated by debt collectors. I am your advocate on the @FSCDems Committee and I am working to ensure you are protected, not targeted.

Everyday, Americans and Small Business Owners are affected, harassed and threatened by predatory #debt collection practices, sometimes for debts that aren’t even their own or have already been paid! Stronger action needs to be taken to ensure that consumers are protected.

The new @USDOL overtime rule does not keep pace with the changing economy, failing to provide 8.2 million workers will access to overtime pay. People are working overtime, spending less time with their families, and not being compensated for it.

El Paso. Tree of Life. Pulse Nightclub. Charleston. Oak Creek. Violence motivated by hate is a growing problem in the United States. It’s going to take serious, sustained action to stem the tide of these crimes. Democrats are committed to leading the charge.

If President Trump’s Dirty Water Rule is finalized, generations to come will point to this action as the moment where comprehensive water quality protections in the United States ceased to exist. We must put #PeopleBeforePolluters and #ProtectOurWater.

Clean water is a fundamental human need and Americans rely on rivers and streams to supply clean drinking water to their families... yet, the Trump EPA is rolling back clean water protections. #DirtyWaterRule #ProtectOurWater

In an unprecedented attack on our nation’s waters, President Trump and his EPA are reorienting the agency toward industry-friendly interests. Here in Congress, @HouseDems & @TransportDems are putting #PeopleBeforePolluters.

The Trump Administration’s public charge rule was written with the clear intent of intimidating and discriminating against immigrants of color and stacking the immigration system in favor of the wealthy. I say #NoToPublicCharge.

The Trump Administration’s #PublicCharge rule is a blatant attempt to create an immigration system that discriminates against immigrants of color. That’s why the #TriCaucus is fighting to #ProtectFamilies and say #NoToPublicCharge.
My bill, the FUTURE Act is coming to the House floor TONIGHT! We must pass this bill to provide critically important funding to HBCUs and other minority serving institutions! #HBCUStrong

In April, @RepUnderwood and I launched the Black Maternal Health Caucus to elevate the Black maternal health crisis within Congress & advance policy solutions to end racial disparities in maternal health. Follow the @BMHCaucus on Twitter for the latest updates!

Over 1/2 of the mass shootings in the US involve intimate partner or family violence. The majority of these kinds of killers have a history of domestic violence. Women here are 21X more likely to be killed w/a gun than women in other high-income countries. We need #VAWA!

For 25 years, VAWA has led our nation's response to the epidemics of domestic violence, sexual assault, dating violence, and stalking. How deeply shameful that @senatemajldr and Senate Republicans have let VAWA expire! We must stand up for #VAWA4ALL by passing HR1585! #VAWA25

More than 3 women are murdered by their partners EVERY DAY in the U.S. #VAWA19 will save lives. Senate Republicans and @senatemajldr must stand with women and pass H.R. 1585 NOW! Survivors deserve nothing less. #VAWA4ALL

For 25 years VAWA has kept women alive & made our communities safer. It's trained law enforcement, strengthened our legal systems, and been a lifeline for survivors. It's time to put politics aside and honor the legacy of #VAWA25 by passing HR1585 the VAWA Reauthorization!
